DELETE /accounts/{account_id}.description: Delete a specific account (only available for tenant admins at this time). This is a permanent operation that will delete any zones or other resources under the account

schema.description: The account ID of the account to be deleted

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.
Whether the API call was successful.

schema.description: Maximum number of results per page.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

GET /accounts/{account_id}/organizations.description:
Retrieve a list of the organizations that "contain" this account or are
managing it.

The returned list will be in order from "root" to "leaf", where the "leaf"
will be the organization that _immediately_ contains the specified
account.

items.description: References an Organization in the Cloudflare data model.

POST /accounts.description: Create an account (only available for tenant admins at this time)

unit.description: information related to the tenant unit, and optionally, an id of the unit to create the account on. see https://developers.cloudflare.com/tenant/how-to/manage-accounts/

Two-Factor Authentication is enabled

POST /accounts/{account_id}/move.description: Move an account within an organization hierarchy or an account outside an organization. (Currently in Closed Beta - see https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/organizations/)

requestBody.description: The destination organization ID is where the account is to be moved.

POST /accounts/move.description: Batch move a collection of accounts to a specific organization. ⚠️ Not implemented.

account_ids.description: Move these accounts to the destination organization.

destination_organization_id.description: Move accounts to this organization ID.
